title: Baechigi
text:
Baechigi (Korean: 배치기; stylized as BaeChiGi) is a South Korean hip hop duo formed by Sniper Sound in 2005. The duo moved to YMC Entertainment in 2012. They debuted on February 17, 2005, with the album Giant.


== Members ==
Muwoong (무웅)
Tak (탁)
